channel.title: The Chris Harrington Podcast
channel.description:
Tech House, Prog House, Techno, & Electro House is what you can expect to hear every month on the Chris Harrington Podcast. Check back each month to hear some of Chris's favorite tracks!
The Chris Harrington Podcast is also broadcast on www.Party107.com on the 4th Wednesday of each month during the Progressive Transmissions show at 5PM Pacific/8PM Eastern.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Housey Goodness!
channel.itunes:author: Chris Harrington
channel.itunes:summary:
Tech House, Prog House, Techno, & Electro House is what you can expect to hear every month on the Chris Harrington Podcast. Check back each month to hear some of Chris's favorite tracks!
The Chris Harrington Podcast is also broadcast on www.Party107.com on the 4th Wednesday of each month during the Progressive Transmissions show at 5PM Pacific/8PM Eastern.

item.title: Episode 002 - Live @ Lotus Sound Lounge (Vancouver, Canada)
item.description: The Last half of Chris's set live from Lotus in Vancouver for the "Da El" Release party on Feburary 5th 2010. Tracklist: 1. D. Ramirez, Mark Knight & Underworld - Downpipe (Dub Mix) 2. Luetzenkirchen - I House You (Original Mix) 3. Pirupa & Pigi - Sweet Devil (Original Mix) 4. Cirez D - On Off (Sebastien Leger Remix) 5. Seb Olavie - Drunk Frog (Original Mix) 6. John Dahlback - Hustle Up (Paul Thomas Remix) 7. Pitto - Feelin' (Joris Voorn Can't Cick This Feelin' When It Hits Remix) 8. Tocadisco Vs. The Chemical Brothers - Hey Morumbi (Avicii Bootleg) 9. Dirty South - We Are (Avicii Remix) 10. Spencer & Hill - Right On Time (Original Mix) 11. Jean Elan - Shake Me (Original Mix) Check out & Buy the Da El Release here: https://www.beatport.com/en-US/html/content/release/detail/218472/Da%20El Also Check out all the info about Friday night at Lotus here: http://www.systemsound.ca/ Enjoy the set!
item.dc:creator: Chris Harrington
item.itunes:summary:
The Last half of Chris's set live from Lotus in Vancouver for the "Da El" Release party on Feburary 5th 2010.
Tracklist:
1. D. Ramirez, Mark Knight & Underworld - Downpipe (Dub Mix) 2. Luetzenkirchen - I House You (Original Mix) 3. Pirupa & Pigi - Sweet Devil (Original Mix) 4. Cirez D - On Off (Sebastien Leger Remix) 5. Seb Olavie - Drunk Frog (Original Mix) 6. John Dahlback - Hustle Up (Paul Thomas Remix) 7. Pitto - Feelin' (Joris Voorn Can't Cick This Feelin' When It Hits Remix) 8. Tocadisco Vs. The Chemical Brothers - Hey Morumbi (Avicii Bootleg) 9. Dirty South - We Are (Avicii Remix) 10. Spencer & Hill - Right On Time (Original Mix) 11. Jean Elan - Shake Me (Original Mix)
Check out & Buy the Da El Release here: https://www.beatport.com/en-US/html/content/release/detail/218472/Da%20El Also Check out all the info about Friday night at Lotus here: http://www.systemsound.ca/
Enjoy the set!

item.title: Episode 001 - January 2010 Studio Mix
item.description: A brand new studio mix from Chris featuring some of his favourite Tech House & Techno tracks at the moment! 1. SKLA - Jazmatazz (Original Mix) [Uncovered] 2. Umek & Jay Lumen - Sinful Ladies (Original Mix) [Great Stuff] 3. Tristan Garner & Gregori Klosman - F**kin' Down (Dub) [Joia] 4. Nima Saeedi - Da El (Right Hand Barber Remix) [Uncovered] 5. Cirez D - On Off (Sebastien Leger Remix) [Mouseville] 6. Chemical Brothers Vs Tocadisco - Hey Morumbi (Avicii Bootleg) [CD-R] 7. Laidback Luke & Gregor Saito - Shine Your Light (Siege Remix) [Mixmash] 8. Fatboy Slim Vs. Fedde Le Grand - Praise You 2009 (Fedde Le Grand Remix) [Skint] 9. J.N.B & DJ Metzker Viktoria - Playgirl (Patric La Funk PLF Remix) [Haiti Groove] 10. Funkagenda - Nobody Listens To Techno (Original Mix) [Toolroom] Check back again soon for a new episode!
